channel.title: Whonix KDE
channel.description: Hi, community. I install Xfce on my Whonix and now need to change it back for KDE. How to bring back KDE desctop saving all my current settings, and especially bring back all original KDE settings that was there from the beginning?

item.title: Whonix KDE
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kde shouldn’t be gone, unless you uninstalled it. All you need to do is changing back to display manager kdm in this case.

sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install --reinstall kdm sudo dpkg-reconfigure kdm

Also see:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Design and Goals

Whonix ™ Overview. Online Anonymity via Tor and Security by Isolation. Based on Debian. Whonix ™ Architecture.

Read full topic
